info.name: Australion Classic
info.description: The Australis minimalist and customizable style for Firefox with Chromium theme. For Firefox 20 or more, and requies FxChrome add-on. Classic Style Edition.
info.additionalInfo:
This is classic style, we are working on an improved interface in Second Edition. Would you love to have a nice user interface, customizable and easy to use? If Chrome can do it, so can Firefox. With some practical steps you can make it happen, and complement to other styles. How can you pick a color? How does it work? This system uses practically a basic components (HSL and RGB) in tabs or toolbar. You can improve your own design, with high quality images, installing MyPlus. Everything and more is in the comfortable design of Australion, free lifetime, and you can make a suggestion to your want. --- Acknowledgements: This work is inspired in Australis by the FXChrome author (public domain). It also includes certain styles of DarkBlue of Antonio Ferreiro and the site ThemeBeta. For the fxchrome theme visit: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/fxchrome/ For the Movable Button addon: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/movable-firefox-button Thanks the author by donating via Bitcoin, address is: 1BbmJoH6a7dGbB79fWzybE5Y38ohktBKwj Additional Styles
  1. Chrome Icons,
  2. Windows controls (classic).
  3. Browser Greeter,
Release Notes (DD/MM/YYYY) 27/09/2013 - CSS validator update. Plane is default. 17/06/2013 - CSS element duplication removed: tab-browser. 10/06/2013 - Microfix. 13/05/2013 - New Windows XP style and buttons. Style 69625. 03/05/2013 - Tab separators. Style 60102. 01/05/2013 - Error page fixed. Blank page option. Fresh color in other windows (see blog) 30/04/2013 - Preferences Window (based in style). App button (+ addon). 29/04/2013 - Build. Registered in SafeCreative. 23/04/2013 - Background new tab/home tab using photos (My Plus). 21/04/2013 - Full update for Menu popup, simple and clear. 19/04/2013 - Firefox Menu and scrollbar to 500px vertical menu. 15/04/2013 - Scrollbars (PD form Style 68236) 13/04/2013 - End Release Candidate. Details Fixed in beta versions. 05/04/2013 - Start Release Candidate. More colors, better options! 04/04/2013 - "Sorry" update: Optimized for FXChrome like Australis, (Style 85387). New colors! 31/03/2013 - Close the tab on the left, (Style 43992) 27/03/2013 - Beta release, dynamic tabs (from Style 50344). 24/03/2013 - Microupdate for about:neterror. Support for about:privatebrowsing and about:home. 06/03/2013 - Preview: about:blank and about:newtab (one color from Style 42706). 05/03/2013 - Eliminating unnecessary parameters. 04/03/2013 - Adding Verou Lea's pattern (CSS3), improvisations. 03/03/2013 - First release, blue available only. Additional colors and fix bugs soon.
